group_1.textLeft: Oh, so you actually came instead of running@away.

group_1.textRight: What's with the attitude? You're the one who@called me here.

group_1.textLeft: You seem to be in a bad mood yourself.
Are you angry that things didn't go@according to plan?

group_1.textRight: What? I could ask you the same thing.
You summoned me here because things didn't@go as you had hoped, right?

group_1.textCenter: Okay, that's enough. We're here for@a discussion, so let's leave it at that.

group_1.narration: — Mifuyu —@Thank you for agreeing to meet with us.
— Kanagi —@I'm a leader after all. I'm just thinking@about what's best for the east.
— Kanagi —@Now then, how should we settle this?@I know a simple apology won't do.
— Mifuyu —@I think the proper course of action@would be...to offer Grief Seeds.
— Mifuyu —@As well as our right to negotiate with@Chuo Ward to expand our territory.
— Kanagi —@It sounds like you're doing quite well.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe we are, because unlike your side...
We don't have to resort to attacking Magical@Girls in the neutral zone.

group_1.textRight: Wait, what do you mean by that?

group_1.textLeft: Momoko was attacked in a Labyrinth in Chuo@Ward by a Magical Girl from the east.

group_1.textRight: That's why we organized this meeting...

group_1.textLeft: Are you telling us you didn't know about@that?
Sounds like you're neglecting your duties.

group_1.textRight: One of my girls was also attacked by a@girl from the west.
You look caught by surprise as well.
Now who's the one that doesn't have control?

group_1.textCenter: Please calm down, both of you.
We started talking under the assumption that@you knew about the attack, but...
Maybe we should clarify a few things first.
